entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 1999/4. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D95: TÁRKI Omnibus 1999/4. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12

entry.dcterms:description: 1. payment of jobs, their stability in the state and private sector 2. party preferences, political attitudes 3. attitudes towards the NATO attack in Yugoslavia 4. Rokeach value test, child rearing principles
entry.dcterms:subject: demography
social behaviour and attitudes
social stratification and groupings
religion and values
mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
economic conditions and indicators
local society, region
international politics and organisations
conflict, security and peace
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
